QuestData.Title: The Nighthold: Talisman of the Shal'dorei
QuestData.Description: When the Nighthold was built, my people forged a talisman that allowed access to these halls. With the talisman's power, one could traverse the palace unhindered, taking the fight directly to the magistrix. Using fragments of the Nightwell's power, we could locate the talisman and end this foolish war...
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 4 Echoes of Time from Elisande in The Nighthold on Heroic Difficulty.
